sections.greeting: Hello, may I speak with (list nameplease

questions.text: Do you wish to remain on our mailing list?

responses.next_question: The Philip Morris maintains a list of adult smokers regardless of brand. Would you like to remain on that list?

responses.text: I do not smoke a Philip Morris brand
responses.next_question: The Philip Morris maintains a list of adult smokers regardless of brand. Would you like to remain on that list?

questions.text: Why haven't I ever received coupons?

responses.text: Philip Morris sends promotional offers and coupons to selected individuals on the mailing list
